about_the_game:
The Warrior War is an action-packed shooting game! With various difficulty levels, you can find the challenge that suits you best. The game also features online interactions, including a chat function to communicate with other players.

Story

Jacob, a military soldier, was summoned to invade enemy territory. Upon arrival, his captain divided the team into platoons to scout specific areas for enemy combatants. Unbeknownst to them, the enemy was disguised as civilians, leading to a deadly ambush. A ground mine exploded, leaving Jacob with four soldiers and no communication in hostile territory.

Your War Kit:

  • AK-47

  • G36C

  • Explosive Grenade

  • Smoke Grenade

You must survive amidst the chaos of outlaw soldiers disguised as civilians!

Will you survive, soldier?
